content.raw: I'm noticing some issues with the ball valve (haven't looked at the others yet). If you insert the drc_practice_ball_valve_wall, then the valves won't turn. The wall is static, which causes all the valves to be static. I'll take a shot at fixing it.
content.html: I'm noticing some issues with the ball valve (haven't looked at the others yet). If you insert the drc_practice_ball_valve_wall, then the valves won't turn. The wall is static, which causes all the valves to be static. I'll take a shot at fixing it.
